CustomField.formula: IF (Text( Case_Notes_as_to_What_Was_Processed__c ) = "No",5,0) + IF (Text( Case_Detail_Populated_Correctly__c ) = "No",5,0) + IF (Text( Case_Created_For_Central_Records__c ) = "No",5,0) + IF (Text( Application_Followed_Into_Docfinity__c ) = "No",5,0) + IF (Text( Native_System_Work_Correct__c ) = "No",5,0) + IF (Text( Emails_Professional_Include_Details__c ) = "No",5,0) + IF (Text( Phone_Call_First_Attempt_for_Missing_Inf__c ) = "No",5,0) + IF (Text( Communication_to_Appropriate_Contacts__c ) = "No",5,0) + IF (Text( Responded_to_Questions_within_24_hours__c ) = "No",5,0) + IF (Text( Unread_Emails_Closed_Or_Replied_SLA__c ) = "No",5,0) + IF (Text( Partner_Case_Replied_Within_SLA__c ) = "No",5,0)
CustomField.label: Membership Specials Points Missed
